column1: The '''Falas''' was an area on the west coast of [[Beleriand]], facing the [[Belegaer]]. The [[Falathrim]], [[Sindarin]] [[Elves]] ruled by [[Círdan]], dwelt here.
The River [[Brithon]] and the River [[Nenning]] ran into the sea here. The Elves built the [[Havens of the Falas
column2: havens]] of [[Brithombar]] and [[Eglarest]]. [[Finrod]] built the tower of [[Barad Nimras]] ("White Horn Tower") on a cape of the Falas between Brithombar and Eglarest.

column1: The Falas only occasionally enters into the events of the [[First Age]]; in the [[First Battle]] of Beleriand, Morgoth's host overran the Falas and besieged the two havens, but lifted the siege in order to join in the Second Battle.
